resources.string: A sign post with two signs pointing in opposite directions

Hello fellow traveler,
Welcome to Fate, an interactive app that allows you to take control of your own journey. Choose a story to get started. As you move along the story you will be presented with choices: choose wisely. If it is too hard to make a choice, flip a coin (shown below) to make a decision! Immerse yourself into a world of wonder.


Good luck and take care, The Creator
Synopsis: You meet the love of your life one way or other
Swipe up to flip the coin and \n decide your fate!

WORKS CITED
